meanings.definition: Capable of being protected by copyright.
meanings.sent1: The new song was copyrightable, so the musician registered it.
meanings.sent2: Authors often create copyrightable works like books and poems.
meanings.sent3: The dancing cat video was so copyrightable that it went viral online.
meanings.sent4: Her unique painting style was as copyrightable as a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The logo design was so copyrightable that it stood out among the rest.

meanings.sent1: The original screenplay was copyrightable, so the writer submitted it for protection.
meanings.sent2: Artistic creations are copyrightable once they are fixed in a tangible form.
meanings.sent3: The quirky invention was so copyrightable that it won a patent award.
meanings.sent4: His innovative idea was as copyrightable as a valuable treasure.
meanings.sent5: The unique design was so copyrightable that it caught the attention of many.
